this_title: Watergate: High Crimes in the White House
introduction: It was one of the most notorious political crimes in U.S. history, WATERGATE: HIGH CRIMES IN THE WHITE HOUSE, takes viewers inside the extraordinary story of crime and scandal that took down President Richard Nixon.This gripping documentary looks back at the infamous break-in at the Democratic Headquarters located within the Watergate office complex. What seemed at first a mere burglary soon revealed a vast criminal conspiracy and coverup that took down President Richard Nixon and shook the nation to its core. The story of one of the most notorious political crimes in history, and a president bent on destroying his enemies, remains as relevant as ever.
chinese_title: Watergate: High Crimes in the White House
